sourceMedium.description: Medium of the source (audio for audio radio broadcasts, print for newspapers, typescript for digitised radio bulletin typescripts).

mediaId.description: Media title alias. Usually a 3 letter code of the media title (newspaper, radio station, etc.).

date.description: Full date and time in ISO 8601 format

partnerId.description: Identifier of the partner providing the content item.

countryCode.description: Country code of the content item.

provinceCode.description: Province code of the content item.
